result.execSummary:
The defendant Shawn Robert Schroth was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Shawn Robert Schroth is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Shawn Robert Schroth was found guilty of OWI (5th), a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 346.63(1)(a).
  • Shawn Robert Schroth was found guilty of Bail Jumping-Felony, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes:
Provide DNA sample, pay surcharge.
Pay Victim witness surcharge.  Fine of $600.00 plus all mandatory costs, penalties, surcharges including $50.00 ignition interlock surcharge.
All financial obligations and those ordered in count three:  to be paid through collection by DOC from 25% of funds under Sec. 973.05(4)(b) and as a condition of Extended Supervision.  Any remaining balance to convert to civil judgment.
Consecutive to: *7/14/2016  Consecutive to  count two in 15CF3652.  Order signed by Honorable Jeffrey A. Wagner.

superMiscConds.notes: Obtain AODA assessment.  Complete follow up treatment. Absolute sobriety.  Random urine screens and breathalyzer tests.

supervisions.notes: To commence upon eligibility to reinstate license.
The Court advised defendant  that as a convicted felon not to possess any firearms/body armor; further advised of voting ineligibility.

Pay all applicable costs, fees, assessments and surcharges, DNA surcharge. To be paid as a condition of Extended Supervision imposed in count one. Failure to do so will result in entry of civil judgment.
Concurrent with: Concurrent with count one.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Shawn Robert Schroth

records.addlTxt: Original Transcript (16 pages) commencing 06-07-16 GUILTY PLEA & SENTENCING  received and filed.

Letter from DOC requesting amendment to JOC.
Count one.
Count three.

Defendant Shawn Robert Schroth in court with attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent.  Randy P. Sitzberger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  The court is informed that the defendant will not be retaining private counsel and will be proceeding with Atty Sargent.  Case is adjourned to 6-7-2016 at 8:15 for plea/sentencing.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for June 7, 2016 at 08:15 am.

Defendant Shawn Robert Schroth in court with attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent.  Randy P. Sitzberger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: AMI
Case set for Jury Trial. Defendant requested time to obtain private counsel. State objected to the request. Court orders case calendared for Pre-trial on 5/9/2016 at 8:15 a.m. in Branch 38.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for May 9, 2016 at 08:15 am.

Attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent in court, defendant Shawn Robert Schroth not in court, in custody.  Randy P. Sitzberger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: KAR.
Defendant in custody not produced, appearance waived.  Case calendared for final pretrial conference.  Both parties are prepared to proceed to jury trial.  Case remains calendared for jury trial on 5/4/16 at 8:15 am in Branch 38.
State's Witness List, State's Requested Jury Instructions, and Verdict Forms, received and filed.  Deputy Court Clerk: KAR.

Attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent in court, defendant Shawn Robert Schroth not in court, in custody.  Randy P. Sitzberger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Case set for final pretrial on 4-14-2016 at 8:15am.  Jury trial set for 5-4-2016 at 8:15am.  All final pretrial documents to be filed by the final pretrial hearing.  Final pre-trial scheduled for April 14, 2016 at 08:15 am.  Jury trial scheduled for May 4, 2016 at 08:15 am.

Attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent in court, defendant Shawn Robert Schroth not in court, in custody.  Randy P. Sitzberger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Sargent contacts the court and states that he will starting a trial in Branch 30.  Defendant will be requesting a trial date.  Case set for 3-1-2016 for scheduling.

Attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent in court, defendant Shawn Robert Schroth not in court, in custody.  Randy P. Sitzberger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Deputy court clerk ccp.
Case set for scheduling conference. Defense counsel has received discovery and an offer from the State and requested a projected plea date. Parties advised as of February 1, 2016, this case is assigned to Judge Jeffrey Wagner, Branch 38, Room G55 of the Criminal Justice Facility. Case adjourned to Branch 25.  Plea hearing scheduled for February 29, 2016 at 08:15 am.

Certification of transcript of proceedings of PRELIMINARY HEARING commencing JANUARY 19, 2016 received and filed. (15 Pages.)
Copy of transcript forwarded to STEPHEN A. SARGENT  819 NORTH SIXTH STREET  NINTH FLOOR  MILWAUKEE, WI 53203-1606  PUBLIC DEFENDER.

Defendant Shawn Robert Schroth in court with attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent.  Defendant Shawn Robert Schroth in custody.  James Frisch for Randy P. Sitzberger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the state:Garrett Kochom-Cudahy Police Department Officer.  Exhibit #1 is marked, offered and received into evidence.   Stipulation to the defendant's previous OWI convictions are agreed upon by the parties and approved by the court.   State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Exhibit is ordered withdrawn.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and pleads not guilty.  Case is adjourned to Branch 25.  Scheduling conference scheduled for January 25, 2016 at 08:30 am.

The Court ordered defendant to No use or possession of controlled substances without a valid prescription.
No driving without a valid license.  Defendant advised it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.
Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Shawn Robert Schroth in court with attorney Louis Edward Epps.  Defendant Shawn Robert Schroth in custody.  Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: LM  
Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Rothstein, Branch 25.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for January 19, 2016 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
